summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4630 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Genesee Street to West Charleston Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53901 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
